snippet: Given what happened on Sept. 11, 2001, the exuberant language once used to market the World Trade Center, as reflected in a new edition of a book about the complex, is almost shocking in its poignancy.
abstract: Given what happened on Sept. 11, 2001, the exuberant language once used to market the World Trade Center, as reflected in a new edition of a book about the complex, is almost shocking in its poignancy.

headline.main: New Glimpses of the Twin Towers' Past
headline.print_headline: Capturing Memories Of the Twin Towers
